data.name: Boring Man: Holy Weapon Skins
data.detailed_description:
A great deity has given these skins their blessing! aka ME! No, YOU have a god complex.

                                        

Holy weapon skins are unique skins that can only be unlocked through this DLC!

                                        

This DLC will unlock Holy weapon skins for all existing weapons in the game! As always, these weapon skins are NOT pay-to-win and are purely cosmetic.

You do not need Premium to use these weapon skins, you can equip them right away.

data.short_description: Unlock the Holy weapon skins for all the weapons in Boring Man!

fullgame.name: Boring Man - Online Tactical Stickman Combat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16+
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Boring Man: Holy Weapon Skins

content_descriptors.notes:
Boring Man - OTSC contains depictions of violence and "pixel blood". The characters in Boring Man can die in a variety of gruesome ways, but the pixel art keeps it silly.

Some features imply the inappropriate usage of drugs and alcohol, with little consequence. Boring Man - OTSC does not encourage the overuse of substances and entirely admits this is a controversial PR stunt.
